welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mays Chapel, the charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and experience all the beauty this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport primarily serves Southwest Airlines and other domestic carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves a variety of domestic and international carriers.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves primarily international carriers and some domestic carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and accept the terms and conditions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tipton AAF Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
